amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Law Enforcement Training Center Fund; proceeds; how expended.
amendatorysection.para: The proceeds of the Nebraska Law Enforcement Training Center Fund created by section 81-1414.04 shall be expended by the Nebraska Commission on Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice, as and when appropriated by the Legislature, to be used for the costs and payments to be made by the State of Nebraska to the city of Grand Island for the use by the state of such building or facility or portion thereof, and equipping the same.
